name: testPreviewDescriptionFromConfigurePage
description: The 'Description' can be present preview to the created User from Configure page
descriptionHtml: The 'Description' can be present preview to the created User from Configure page

testStage.description: The 'Description' can be present preview to the created User from Configure page

steps.name: click 'Manage Jenkins' link from Main page
Click Manage Users on ManageJenkins Page
Click Gear 'Configure' button for Admin user
Logout from instance http://localhost:8081/
